item.title: Clean White Theme for Hugo
item.description: Clean White Theme for Hugo CleanWhite is a clean, elegant, but fully functional blog theme for Hugo. Here is a live demo site using this theme. It is based on huxblog Jekyll Theme and Clean Blog Jekyll Theme. These two upstream projects have done awesome jobs to create a blog theme, what I’m doing here is porting it to Hugo, of which I like the simplicity and the much faster

About Me Hi, I am Wen-Hsuheh,Chen , a family medicine physician. My expertise is in chronic disease management and home-based medical care. I am skilled at listening to patients’ needs and discussing how they can improve their lifestyle habits because many chronic diseases stem from poor lifestyle habits. While medication is the simplest and most direct way to treat chronic diseases, I encourage patients to make adjustments in their daily lives so that they can gradually reduce their medication dosage and regain a healthy life.
